projects.title: Small
projects.description: Small python projects I made a few years ago, for fun, in one collection.

projects.title: Spigot Sign Editor
projects.description: A simple sign editor plugin made for Minecraft 1.16+

projects.title: Robot Maze
projects.description: An AI that solves mazes (Intro to Programming)

projects.title: Large Arithmetic Collider
projects.description: A solver written in Haskell for an arithmetic game (Functional Programming)

projects.title: Waffles
projects.description: A restaurant review website, with hand-written data structures (Data Structs & Algorithms)

projects.title: An Essay on Facebook Libra
projects.description: A fairly small essay on the Libra (Diem) Project and its rise and fall. Since the time of writing, Libra has been officially cancelled. (Professional Skills)

projects.title: Noto Qin Jianzipu
projects.description: A font designed to allow typesetting of the special notation used for Guqin, which is usually handwritten. Based off Noto Sans SC.

projects.title: Parser
projects.description: A JavaCC parser and interpreter for a simple integer-based programming language. (Formal Languages)

projects.title: Resolution.
projects.description: A tautology prover, using the Resolution method, written in a logic-based programming language. (Logic and Verification.)

projects.title: Packet Sniffer
projects.description: A multi threaded packet sniffing program, for detecting possible occurences of common attacks. (OS and Networks)
